adjective.description: Clever at achieving one's aims by indirect or deceitful methods.
examples: a crafty crook faked an injury to escape from prison

adjective.description: Of, involving, or relating to the making of decorative objects and other things by hand.
examples: a market full of crafty pots and interesting earrings

origin: Old English cræftig strong, powerful, later skillful (see craft, -y).
